law.catch_line: A person may not bribe or attempt to bribe a juror for rendering a verdict....

text.section: A person may not bribe or attempt to bribe a juror for rendering a verdict.
A juror may not accept a bribe for rendering a verdict.

A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction:
is subject to imprisonment for not less than 18 months and not exceeding 6 years; and
may not serve on a jury in the future.
A person who violates this section is subject to § 5-106(b) of the Courts Article.
